product_name: Sierra Designs Mobile Mummy 1.5-Season Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: This warm-weather sleeping bag moves as you do, so you can sleep on your side, stomach or back without feeling constrained. And, you can wear it like a jacket to sit up and read or play cards.
short_description: This warm-weather sleeping bag moves as you do, so you can sleep on your side, stomach or back without feeling constrained. And, you can wear it like a jacket to sit up and read or play cards.
